replies.body:
Is there i way to know what will be in the next skin and champ sell?
Just so i dont regret buying something and it being on sale in a few days?
nup, riot wants you to pay full price so that you buy more rp
Yep kms, dunno why i still play lol. I am losing the plot just trying to save ip. Let alone rp.
its random every time, check out January sales schedule if you haven't already.
Tsumaranaidesu, thank you. I can wait a year till the skin i want goes on sale.  I wont lose to the system!
